rooms.description: Open space with wheelchair-accessible ramp and Vastu-compliant north-east direction for welcome.
Spacious living area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows facing the south for natural light and enhanced view. Designed with Vastu guidelines to foster positive energy.
Functional kitchen layout, located on the east side as per Vastu principles for health and prosperity, wheelchair-accessible design with wide counters.
Adjacent to the living room, open space with sufficient seating area. Windows installed per Vastu guidelines.
Dedicated workspace placed on the east-west corridor for clarity and concentration, wheelchair-accessible with ample natural lighting through floor-to-ceiling windows.
